title: The Harrowing
body:
Hey Riot, 

I do hope you guys are releasing the previous Harrowing skins, because I'll be dropping some fat cash for those bad boys, I also hope you guys are coping well with all the angry consumers and the hectic worlds competition!

Thank you :)

replies.body: did they release the old ones all other harrowings
I think so man, I really hope they do this year!
hey man i like your name lol
Cheers brother, Fan of Dark Souls? :)
yup an THE HARROWING SKINS ARE UP BROTHER
Serious!? Even the legacy ones? I'm at work at the moment :(
there lolipoppy an even more lol
Sweet, I already have that glorious skin though! ;)
an u have em are u rich lol thats alot of rp lol
Haha i just work quite a bit :p

> [{quoted}](name=Gravelord,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HewG5oA3,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-11-05T02:04:21.644+0000)
>
> Haha i just work quite a bit :p

haha when u getting on lol
i really want one oh btw i sent u a friend request lol
Haha easy man, Ill accept that bad boy and we can play a few games :)
when do they go off sale? the old haarrowing skins
my friend got gifted slayer jinx :<
cuz i dont get payed till next week an im giving my friends stuff with my money :<
I'm not 100% sure man, When they update the NA servers it will probably show on the home page on this site bro :) I'm fairly sure it goes on Californian time

Same. ;-)
oh an the 3 new ones zombie nunu slayer jinx an slayer pantheon

there lolipoppy an bewitching nidalee nosferatu vlad reaper soraka headmistress fiora headless hecarim zpmbie ryze pirate ryze pumpkin head fiddle ravenborn leblanc hunted maokai franken tibbers annie underworld tf definitely not blitz mundo mundo kitty cat kat zombie brand underworld wukong an haunting noc

Sweet i already have,

Lolipoppy 
Reaper Soraka
Headmistress Fiora 
Zombie Ryze

I'll be picking up the rest as soon as i finish work :p

Thank you my friend!
yup an THE HARROWING SKINS ARE UP BROTHER
